name: GBTK#3 - I couldn't use real ads so I self-advertised instead
name_original: GBTK#3 - I couldn't use real ads so I self-advertised instead
description:
My Entry for Game Breaker's Toolkit #3— a 48h game making breaking marathon focused on bad design, horrible mechanics, and stupid ideas. 

^<v>

I'm sure you want to try to collect all yellow pixels in the first level.

Have fun
